statements: SELECT * FROM PortfolioRebalancing;
SELECT account_id, asset_name, current_allocation FROM PortfolioRebalancing WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT asset_name, target_allocation, rebalancing_date FROM PortfolioRebalancing WHERE current_allocation < target_allocation;
SELECT client_id, account_id, asset_name, target_allocation, rebalancing_criteria FROM PortfolioRebalancing ORDER BY rebalancing_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT client_id, rebalancing_criteria FROM PortfolioRebalancing WHERE rebalancing_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT client_id, account_id, asset_name, target_allocation, current_allocation, rebalancing_criteria, rebalancing_date FROM PortfolioRebalancing WHERE client_id = 12345 ORDER BY rebalancing_date DESC
SELECT client_id, asset_name, target_allocation FROM PortfolioRebalancing ORDER BY current_allocation ASC
SELECT * FROM PortfolioRebalancing WHERE rebalancing_criteria LIKE '%rebalance%'
SELECT account_id, current_allocation FROM PortfolioRebalancing WHERE target_allocation > current_allocation
SELECT account_id, SUM(target_allocation) AS total_target_allocation FROM PortfolioRebalancing GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_target_allocation > 1000
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT client_id, portfolio_name FROM portfolios WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT assets FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = '2468ace0-37fb-11eb-adc1-0242ac120002';
SELECT * FROM rebalancing_criteria ORDER BY criteria_name ASC;
SELECT id, criteria_name FROM rebalancing_criteria WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = 'a7b2da9c-ee94-4e4e-bc4e-d8ad379e849d';
SELECT portfolio_name, assets FROM portfolios WHERE id = '483b6bd3-84c0-426a-a013-3460840aa9dd';
SELECT * FROM rebalancing_criteria WHERE criteria_name LIKE '%risk%';
SELECT id, client_id FROM rebalancing_criteria WHERE client_id = 'b2fd6769-ee8d-468d-b00b-0d40760d183f';
SELECT criteria_name, criteria_details FROM rebalancing_criteria WHERE id = 'f464e251-8899-4f59-9b2d-9f20861fd171';
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT client_id, portfolio_value FROM portfolios WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM clients WHERE risk_profile = 'High';
SELECT * FROM rebalancing_logs ORDER BY rebalanced_on DESC;
SELECT id, rebalance_details FROM rebalancing_logs WHERE rebalanced_on > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM portfolios LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, client_id, portfolio_value FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = 12345;
SELECT id, name, age, risk_profile FROM clients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, portfolio_id, rebalanced_on FROM rebalancing_logs WHERE rebalanced_on BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT id, portfolio_id, JSON_LENGTH(rebalance_details) AS num_rebalance_items FROM rebalancing_logs WHERE portfolio_id = 56789;
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM portfolio WHERE portfolio_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT SUM(total_value) AS total_portfolio_value FROM portfolio GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT a.asset_name, a.quantity, p.portfolio_name FROM asset a JOIN portfolio p ON a.portfolio_id = p.portfolio_id;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM portfolio INNER JOIN asset ON portfolio.portfolio_id = asset.portfolio_id
SELECT portfolio_name, asset_name, quantity FROM portfolio, asset WHERE portfolio.portfolio_id = asset.portfolio_id
SELECT portfolio_name, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_portfolio_value FROM portfolio JOIN asset ON portfolio.portfolio_id = asset.portfolio_id GROUP BY portfolio.portfolio_name
SELECT criteria_name, AVG(criteria_value) AS avg_criteria_value FROM criteria GROUP BY criteria_name HAVING AVG(criteria_value) > 100
SELECT p.portfolio_name, a.asset_name, c.criteria_name FROM portfolio p, asset a, criteria c WHERE p.portfolio_id = a.portfolio_id AND p.portfolio_id = c.portfolio_id
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT id, client_id, name FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, name, description FROM portfolios ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM criteria WHERE weight > 0.5;
SELECT assets.id, assets.name, criteria.name FROM assets JOIN rebalancing_rules ON assets.id = rebalancing_rules.asset_id JOIN criteria ON rebalancing_rules.criteria_id = criteria.id;
SELECT * FROM portfolios ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, client_id, name FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = 'f4e195de-3c27-45f6-8f5d-c9a1aee31d0c';
SELECT assets.symbol, assets.name, assets.asset_class, criteria.name FROM assets JOIN criteria ON assets.id = criteria.id;
SELECT clients.first_name, clients.last_name, clients.email, portfolios.description FROM clients JOIN portfolios ON clients.id = portfolios.client_id WHERE clients.email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT assets.name, rebalancing_rules.minimum_amount, rebalancing_rules.maximum_amount FROM assets JOIN rebalancing_rules ON assets.id = rebalancing_rules.asset_id WHERE rebalancing_rules.criteria_id = '940cc912-fb40-4b05-9614-d44c5e3b6014';
